directions: Stir apples, white sugar, brown sugar, honey, cinnamon, and allspice together in a slow cooker.
Cook on High for 1 hour. Change heat to Low and continue cooking until apples are easily mashed with a fork, 9 to 11 hours.
ingredients: 5 1/2 pounds apples - peeled, cored, and thinly sliced
title: Slow Cooker Apple Butter with Honey
